505240.name: Fantasy Grounds - Rolemaster Classic: Fantasy Weapons
505240.description:
Rolemaster Classic: Fantasy Weapons
A Rolemaster Classic library module for Fantasy Grounds
Sixteen weapon attack tables for Rolemaster Classic and RMSS/FRP:
  • Baw
  • Chakram
  • Chegain
  • Cabis
  • Dag
  • Ge
  • Ikasha
  • Irgaak
  • Kalta
  • Kynac
  • Long Knife
  • Long Kynac
  • Saren
  • Shangkana
  • Typh
  • Yarkbalka
Make sure to check out the instructions for how to assign these in the Fantasy Grounds docs folder. You can get there by clicking on Start | Programs | Fantasy Grounds II | Application Data folder and then navigating up to the "docs" folder. Also, be sure to check out the videos and the forums available on the Fantasy Grounds website.
Requirements: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the Rolemaster Classic
ruleset (version 1.51 or higher).
